# build and run

```sh
$ sh build.sh
(press CTRL+A)
(press C key)
(type info registers)
(press ENTER KEY)
(press CTRL+A)
(press X key)
```

# result

```sh
QEMU 4.2.1 monitor - type 'help' for more information
(qemu) info registers

 mhartid  00000000
 mstatus  00000080
 mip      0x0
```
